text: The Securities and Exchange Commission of Myanmar (, abbreviated SECM) is a financial regulatory authority that oversees Myanmar's liquid securities market, including the Yangon Stock Exchange. SECM was formed under the 2013 Securities Exchange Law under the Ministry of Planning and Finance. SECM is currently chaired by Maung Maung Win. ==References== Myanmar Category:Government agencies of Myanmar Category:Securities and exchange commissions Category:2015 establishments in Myanmar Category:Regulation in Myanmar
title: Securities and Exchange Commission of Myanmar
